product_name: Moving Comfort FusionFlex Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With fun stitching and a rainbow of color on the inside waistband to set them apart from the mundane, the women's Moving Comfort FusionFlex capris offer a supportive fit ideal for any workout. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying, odor-resistant fabric helps you stay comfortable and focused on the workout. Mesh side panels combine to slim, smooth, and support your body during tough exercise. Wide waistband offers a flattering fit and stays put during exercise. Rear zip pocket; internal pocket. The women's Moving Comfort FusionFlex capris offer a next-to-skin fit and a mid rise. Closeout.
short_description: With fun stitching and a rainbow of color on the inside waistband to set them apart from the mundane, the women's Moving Comfort FusionFlex capris offer a supportive fit ideal for any workout.
